mapper.select: SELECT E.employee_id, E.password, E.department_id, E.worktype_id, W.worktype, E.position_id, P.position_name, E.name, E.gender, E.birthdate, E.phone_num, E.email, E.address, TO_CHAR(E.employment_date, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS employment_date, D.department_name, NVL(D.manager_name, '미지정') AS manager_name FROM employees E, departments D, worktypes W, positions P WHERE E.department_id = D.department_id AND E.worktype_id = W.worktype_id AND E.position_id = P.position_id AND E.employee_id = #{employee_id} AND E.password = #{password}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees E, departments D WHERE E.department_id = D.department_id AND E.employee_id = D.manager_id AND E.employee_id = #{employee_id} AND E.password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET address = #{address}, email = #{email}, password = #{password} WHERE employee_id = #{employee_id}
